
snap(10,20,-40)

sky(204,241,255)
fog(225,255,225)
ground(211,205,205)

fadefrom(6000)

name(When In Danger Just Chill Out)

nlaps(3)

set(10,0,0,0)p

set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(27,0,12200,0)pr
set(11,0,16800,0)p
set(11,0,22400,0)p
chk(40,0,25300,0)
set(14,0,26950,-90)pt
set(10,-4550,26950,90)p
set(14,-9100,26950,90)pt
chk(40,-9100,28700,0)
set(14,-9100,30450,0)pt
set(10,-4550,30450,90)p
set(23,3850,30450,-90)p
set(29,414,30450,90)pr
set(10,6650,30450,90)p
set(11,12250,30450,90)p
set(14,16800,30450,-90)pt
chk(40,16800,28700,0)
set(14,16800,26950,180)pt
set(10,12250,26950,-90)p
set(14,7700,26950,0)pt
set(11,7700,22400,0)p
set(10,7700,16800,0)
set(26,7700,18800,180)pr
fix(41,7700,13900,-1500,0)s
set(10,7700,11200,0)p

set(37,7400,15000,90)
set(37,8000,14000,90)
set(37,7400,13000,90)
set(37,7700,11000,0)

set(20,7700,5600,0)p
set(17,7700,1050,90)pt
chk(42,9450,1050,90)
set(17,11200,1050,180)pt
set(15,11200,5600,0)
set(34,11200,6700,0)pr
set(15,11200,11200,0)p
set(16,11200,16800,0)p
set(17,11200,21350,0)pt
chk(42,12950,21350,90)
set(17,14700,21350,-90)pt
set(16,14700,16800,0)p
set(15,14700,11200,0)
set(34,14700,11200,0)pr
set(15,14700,5600,0)p
set(20,14700,0,180)p
set(14,14700,-4550,180)pt
set(10,10150,-4550,90)p
chk(40,7350,-4550,90)
set(10,4550,-4550,90)p
set(14,0,-4550,90)pt

maxr(9,21600,-5000)
maxb(7,-7400,-9600)
maxt(7,35800,-9600)
maxl(9,-12000,-5000)
